Name: VR Aquarium -雅-
About the game: You can spend relaxing time with goldfish in VR space. In VR space you can do the following operations. · You can touch goldfish · You can call goldfish · You can take pictures and Gif movie. · You can change the background. · You can change BGM The types of goldfish are below ・Wakin(和金) ・Comet(コメット) ・Ryukin(琉金) ・Demekin(出目金) ・Rantyu(らんちゅう) The type of background is below ・BubbleDome ・Sakura ・Fireworks Future Update · Increase the kind of goldfish · Adjust the appearance of goldfish · Add the function to edit Aquarium · Plans to fix the problem
